content:
# It seems there is still no output from the inventory check, which makes it unclear whether I have stones available for crafting.
# Since I am at the stone resource patch, I can gather stones directly to ensure I have enough for crafting.

# I will proceed to harvest stones from the nearest stone resource to ensure I have enough for the stone furnace.
harvest_resource(nearest(Resource.Stone), quantity=5)  # Harvest 5 stones from the nearest stone resource.
